properties.name: value
properties.doc: The value that is set for this slider. It would be a lov label if it is used.

properties.name: min
properties.doc: The minimum value. This is ignored when lov is defined.

properties.name: max
properties.doc: The maximum value. This is ignored when lov is defined.

properties.name: text_anchor
properties.doc:
When the lov property is used, this property indicates the location of the label. Possible values are:
  • "bottom"
  • "top"
  • "left"
  • "right"
  • "none" (no label is displayed)

properties.name: labels
properties.doc: The labels for specific points of the slider. If set to True, this slider uses the labels of the lov if there are any. If set to a dictionary, the slider uses the dictionary keys as a lov key or index, and the associated value as the label.

properties.name: continuous
properties.doc: If set to False, the control emits an on_change notification only when the mouse button is released, otherwise notifications are emitted during the cursor movements. If lov is defined, the default value is False.

properties.name: change_delay
properties.doc: Minimum time between triggering two on_change calls. The default value is defined at the application configuration level by the change_delay configuration option. if None or 0, there's no delay.

properties.name: width
properties.doc: The width, in CSS units, of this element.

properties.name: height
properties.doc: The height, in CSS units, of this element. It defaults to the width value when using the vertical orientation.

properties.name: orientation
properties.doc:
The orientation of this slider.
Valid values are "horizontal" or "vertical".
